column6: the Office of Investigation and Implementation of the Immigration Phnom Penh received two foreigners:  1. NGUYEN THI HOANG OANG
column7: a 47-year-old female Vietnamese national who entered the Kingdom of Cambodia on t24.05.2019 at the Bavet international border Tourists staying current visa as a tourist.------2.  KENNETH ADOTAMA NNAEMEKA a 23-year-old Nigerian male who illegally entered the Kingdom of Cambodia. He said he arrived in January 2018 from Vietnam aiming to find work.------The pair were sent to the Department of Immigration to carry out the proceedings of the law.------Source: ------PP Police
